plot: With the passing of her grandmother. Playful Linda takes off to walk the same path her grandmother and her did. Not heeding her mother's warning, Linda gets lost and can't find her way back home.
title: Historia breve de una nina
plot_es: With the passing of her grandmother. Playful Linda takes off to walk the same path her grandmother and her did. Not heeding her mother's warning, Linda gets lost and can't find her way back home.
plot_en: With the passing of her grandmother. Playful Linda takes off to walk the same path her grandmother and her did. Not heeding her mother's warning, Linda gets lost and can't find her way back home.
